Questions.Title: Which of the following is TRUE?

Options.A: Every relation in 3NF is also in BCNF
Options.B: A relation R is in 3NF if every non-prime attribute of R is fully functionally dependent on every key of R
Options.C: Every relation in BCNF is also in 3NF
Options.D: No relation can be in both BCNF and 3NF

Questions.Title: Assuming P not equal to NP, which of the following is TRUE?
